reviewText: Do not waste your money on this movie. I guess the remaining Cristeros lived the way they are shown on this movie, but it has no script, nothing.
Not a lot of word and very theatrical.  It get you to think really what these men could be thinking and going through.

A enlightening look at the few Catholics who held out against the tyrannical Mexican govt in the 1920s-1930s.  They made unimaginable sacrifices to be true to their beliefs.  The movie is somewhat slow, but it imparts the reality of what resistance meant to the government.  They hated it!
